articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Factories to Congratulate Workers on May Day
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Factories to Congratulate Workers on May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Taegwan Glass Factory and the Machine Plant managed by Ho Chol Yong to congratulate their workers on May Day.
					 He was accompanied by senior officials of the party and army including Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Chol Hae, Pak To Chun, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Jae Il, Kim Myong Guk, Son Chol Ju, Yun Tong Hyon, Hwang Pyong So, Kang Kwan Il and Pak Jong Chon.
					
					 The first leg of his visit was the Taegwan Glass Factory.
					
					 As he arrived at the factory, he extended warm congratulations and salute to its workers significantly marking the international holiday of the workers all over the world that demonstrates their might and revolutionary solidarity. 
					
					 He, to begin with, saw modern optical measuring instruments developed by the factory.
					
					 He praised its workers for developing modern optical measuring instruments and working hard to raise their utility rate after acquainting himself with the principle of their operation and performance.
					
					 He went round various places of the factory including its designing room, automation room, e-library and sample room to learn in detail about the technological updating and production at the factory.
					
					 Making the rounds of various rooms at the comprehensive electronic service center which looks like a scientific research institute, he was pleased with the great progress made by the workers there in their efforts to put all the processes of production on a modern and scientific basis ranging from designing of products to processing and assembling.
					
					 He set forth the tasks to serve as guidelines for management and production at the factory, noting that the demand for modern glass products and optical instruments is on the daily increase.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Machine Plant Managed by Ho Chol Yong.
					
					 Making the rounds of the general assembling shop, sheet metal processing shop and various other production processes, he acquainted himself in detail with production, mechanism, performance and technical specifications of machines.
					
					 He praised the officials, workers, scientists and technicians of the plant for manufacturing modern machines of Korean style, noting that the machines produced by the plant are very good in their performance and paying off in reality. 
					
					 After seeing machines, he put forth important tasks facing the plant.
					
					 Then he went round the Kangsong Health Complex newly built at the plant.
					
					 The complex covering a total plottage of more than 10 000 square meters consists of a swimming pool, wading pool, shower rooms, public baths and private baths, dining hall, kitchen and photo studio on the first floor and a gymnasium, table tennis room, e-library, barber's, beauty parlor and amusement room on the second floor.
					
					 At the swimming pool and wading pool, he was pleased to see swimming and wading workers. He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that they have come to have good rest at the wonderful place.
					
					 He had a photo session with the servants of the Kangsong Health Complex, expressing expectation that they would devotedly serve the workers.
					
					 Telling the officials that he would like to spread a carpet in the compound for the workers of the plant, he wished them steady success in production.
					
					 He had a photo session with the soldier-builders who creditably discharged the duty of the KPA in building the health complex for the workers of the plant.

articles.title: Nigerians Pay Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Nigerians Pay Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The chiefs of Nigerian organizations visited the DPRK embassy in Lagos on April 23 in congratulation of the dear respected Kim Jong Un upon his election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC). They included the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Group for the Study of Kimjongilism, the chairman of the Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, the chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy and chiefs of Juche idea study organizations of Nigeria.
					 The visitors laid bouquets before the full-length figure portrait of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before paying tribute.
					
					 They said Kim Jong Un is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, adding that Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the party and state of the DPRK was a reflection of the unanimous faith of the Juche idea followers of the world.
					
					 M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said he was lucky to visit the DPRK this time to see the noble image of Kim Jong Un and hear his ringing voice and that it was great honor not only for him but the Juche idea study followers of Nigeria.
					
					 The visitors paid highest tribute to the President and Kim Jong Il who provided a steady continuity to the revolutionary cause of Juche, and extended warm congratulations again to supreme leader Kim Jong Un upon his election as first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the DPRK NDC.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by Japanese Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net headed by Director Michihiro Sasaki Tuesday laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of People's Security led by Ri Song Chol, councilor and department director, came back home on Tuesday after visiting China. 
					 The delegation of Tochigi Prefectural Citizens Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship led by its Secretary General Koichi Hashimoto left here on the same day.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 122nd May Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 122nd May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Sangwon Cement Complex on Tuesday to mark the 122nd May Day, international holiday of the working people. 
					 Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a report. 
					
					 He said that May Day offers a significant occasion for powerfully demonstrating the revolutionary spirit and might of all the working people in the DPRK and boosting the international solidarity with the world working people struggling for democratic freedom and rights and independent life. 
					
					 The Korean revolution was unprecedentedly arduous, but the working people of the DPRK have been able to fully discharge their noble mission and duty in the sacred struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and socialism thanks to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il put forward the working people as the master of the country and the revolution and led the revolution and construction to victory. Their revolutionary history has been steadily carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un, eye-opening achievements have been made in all the fields of the revolution and construction and the great idea of the party for providing the people with socialist prosperity has become a reality. 
					
					 A lot of working people in the world aspire after independence, progress and national prosperity. But none of them enjoy as worthwhile life as working people in the DPRK who build a rich and powerful nation by their creative labors under the care of the great leader. 
					
					 It is the great honor and happiness of the working people in Juche Korea to open up the glorious heyday of prosperity upholding Kim Jong Un in the van of the revolution, being blessed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Bright and rosy is the future of the Korean people advancing for a new great victory of the Juche revolution with the national pride and honor of holding Kim Jong Un in the van of the revolution. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju and officials concerned, labor innovators, scientists and technicians and other working people.

articles.title: Art Performances Mark May Day
articles.content:
Art Performances Mark May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given by the artistes of national art troupes in various parts of Pyongyang on Tuesday to mark May Day, an international holiday of workers,.
					 A performance was given by the artistes of the National Fork Art Troupe at the park of Mangyongdae Funfair.
					
					 Colorful numbers were put on the stage of the performance that started with male duet and chorus "May Day Song". They included female trio "Boundless in Yearning", chorus "May, Month of Victory" and female solo "Song of Chollima Forerunner".
					
					 The performers praised the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who built socialist system on this land where the working masses are leading a worthwhile life as the master of the country, and opened up the heyday of national prosperity.
					
					 A performance of the artistes of Phibada Opera Troupe was given at the Arch of Triumph plaza.
					
					 Enjoying female solo "Attraction and Reverence", mixed duet "We Are a Worker Couple", mixed chorus "Let's Meet Each Other on the Front" and other numbers, the audience were convinced of the rosy future of the DPRK blessed with the sun, recalling the proud path of victory covered by them holding the hammer, sickle and writing brush under the guidance of the great Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 To the cheerful tune of male solo "Arirang for Prosperity" and female group dance "Tondollari", they sang and danced together with the performers, adding to the festive atmosphere.
					
					 The artistes of the Mansudae Art Troup performed at the Taesongsan Pleasure Park to the delight of the working people.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Join Working People Enjoying May Day
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Join Working People Enjoying May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state Tuesday joined working people in different parts of the country in marking the 122nd May Day. 
					 Among them were Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol and officials of the cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, local party and power bodies. They went to the Sangwon Cement Complex, Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory, Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant, Taean Heavy Machine Complex, Chollima Steel Complex, Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District and other institutions, factories, enterprises and farms to congratulate workers, agricultural workers and intellectuals on the holiday. 
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and his smiling portraits and mosaics depicting Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Touring the revolutionary museums, rooms devoted to the history of relevant units and other places they recalled the revolutionary careers and devoted efforts by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The senior officials felt once again that the Korean working people could discharge their missions and duties as master of the country and the revolution thanks to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They met and conversed with innovators and encouraged them to bring about fresh success in their work. 
					
					 Together with working people they played colorful sports and amusement games including tug of war, chess and Yut games and enjoyed art performances. 
					
					 They requested all the working people to become heroes of the times and performers of feats in the worthwhile struggle for fresh victory of the Juche revolution under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean People Celebrate May Day
articles.content:
Korean People Celebrate May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- People in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea celebrate May Day, an international holiday of the working people.
					 An endless stream of visitors climb Mansu Hill in Pyongyang where statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand, carrying flowers in their hands.
					
					 Seen in every street across the country are national flags and placards displayed to celebrate the holiday.
					
					 Factories and enterprises, including the Sangwon Cement Complex, and organizations and all families are enjoying the holiday with sports and cultural events and amusement games.
					
					 Picturesque Moran Hill, Mt. Taesong and Rungna Islet in Pyongyang, Waudo Pleasure Park in Nampho, Songdowon Pleasure Park in Wonsan and other scenic spots and parks of the country are crowded with holidaymakers.
					
					 Paek Kwang Ho, head of a workteam at the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory, told KCNA: 
					
					 "I am here in Pothonggang Pleasure Park with my family and friends to spend this happy holiday. We are going to have a recreation gathering after lunch.
					
					 The happier we are, the deeper our thanks for the peerlessly great persons, who provided this good social system, are growing.
					
					 I'll work harder to build a thriving nation so as to repay their benefits."

articles.title: Workers of DPRK, Forerunners in Era
articles.content:
Workers of DPRK, Forerunners in Era
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- On May Day the working people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recall with deep emotion the course of victory and glory covered by them under the leadership of the peerlessly great persons.
					 In his early years President Kim Il Sung ushered in a new era of history, the era of Juche for realizing independence of the broad working masses, including workers, peasants and intellectuals, under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 Even in the difficult period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle he saw to it that May Day was significantly celebrated, and attended a Pyongyang mass rally, held to mark the first May Day in the liberated country, to congratulate the workers and encourage them to turn out in building a new country.
					
					 In the postwar period he called on the workers at the Kangson Steel Complex to kindle the torch of the Chollima Movement. He had wisely led the working people to perform great feats in socialist construction in every period and stage of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il put the workers forward as the main force in building a socialist economic power, saying that the present world belongs to the working class. Under the deep loving care and trust of the leader, who trained ordinary workers to be heroes of the times and performers of feats, the Korean workers could bring about a fresh upsurge in the revolution and construction with their indomitable mental power.
					
					 The history of guidance by the great persons who put forward the working masses as the master of the country is given steady continuity under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Regarding the working class as the core force in building a thriving country, Kim Jong Un has given ceaseless field guidance to major industrial establishments so that the workers can fully play their role as forerunners of the era.
					
					 He provided a grand fireworks display on May Day, and would unreservedly take greasy hands of workers, calling them his comrades-in-arms, whenever visiting factories.
					
					 The working people in the DPRK are now filled with the will to strive for victory in the cause of building a thriving nation in hearty response to his call "Forward towards the final victory!"

articles.title: Japan Is Not Pacific State: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Japan Is Not Pacific State: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Japan has long covered the path of military expansion deceiving the international community under the mask of a "pacific state". However, it is now putting off the mask. 
					 The "three principles of arms export" which Japan advertised as the emblem of "pacific state" is becoming defunct. 
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday runs a bylined commentary in this regard.
					
					 By rendering ineffective the "three principles of arms export" Japan seeks to step up the moves to make it a military giant and possess military capability conducive to the earliest realization of its ambition for militarist expansion overseas, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The fundamental softening of the principles will make Japan easily access ultra-modern military hardware with the help of other countries
					
					 In case weapons Japan developed with other countries spread to the world's hot-spots of high military tensions, it will no doubt have serious impact on global peace and security.
					
					 Japan is emerging a dangerous war force as it takes part in global arms race, harassing world peace and stability.
					
					 It is no longer a pacific state and has no interest in peace.
					
					 The world should pay attention to this dangerous development and never allow Japan to go military.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should immediately stop the moves to become a military giant which threaten peace in Asia and other parts of the world, bearing in mind that war will lead to self-destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Displaying Revolutionary Spirit of Working People in Songun Era
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Displaying Revolutionary Spirit of Working People in Songun Era
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial marking May Day calls upon working people in the DPRK to fully display the revolutionary spirit by performing heroic feats in the ongoing grand advance. 
					 The working people in the DPRK are displaying their might as the most revolutionary people upholding the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader with firm faith and obligation, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the most sacred revolutionary traits of the working people in the DPRK to absolutely trust in and follow the party and the leader with loyalty. 
					
					 The history of building a thriving nation has been associated with blood and sweats shed by our working people who have upheld the party and the leader with hammer, sickle and writing brush reflecting their confidence while effecting a fresh revolutionary surge. 
					
					 It is the invariable will of our people to uphold the idea and leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un with loyalty while holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Songun. All the people are working hard to successfully implement the instructions of Kim Jong Il, closely united around Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The working people have brought about epochal changes in the shortest historical period of time despite of the ceaseless economic blockade by the imperialists. This miracle could have been wrought only by the working people of Songun Korea. 
					
					 Today the Korean people are waging grand struggle to build a knowledge-based economic power and a highly civilized socialist country in this land under the leadership of the great party. 
					
					 Thanks to the devoted efforts by all the working people for the prosperity of the socialist nation, we will proudly declare the emergence of an economic power by making a leaping progress and innovation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blames U.S. for Sparking Arms Race
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blames U.S. for Sparking Arms Race
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The United States held big share in the world military expenditure that totaled 1 740 billion dollars last year, according to the data recently released by the Stockholm International Peace Research Institute in Sweden. With its military expenditure standing at 711 billion the U.S. topped the world's list in the military spending. Huge amount of them was spent for the modernization of nuclear weapons and establishment of missile defense system, etc. 
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined commentary: 
					
					 It is natural that world media brand the U.S. as a chief culprit disturbing world peace and stability and an arch criminal sparking off arms race.
					
					 Big clouds of a nuclear war hanging heavily over the world people now are attributable to the U.S. moves for increasing military expenditure. 
					
					 If the U.S. has true intention to ensure world peace and stability, it should reduce its military expenditure running at an astronomical figure and stop actions of fomenting and escalating arms race. The ceaseless aggression and wars and chronic economic and financial crisis are also forcing the U.S. to cut down its military expenditure. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. eyes giving spurs to expanding military expenditure regardless of the situation. 
					
					 The assistant secretary of the U.S. Defense Department for World Strategy recently said that the U.S. pushes forward U.S.-Japan-south Korea and U.S.-Japan-Australia negotiations for establishing missile defense system in Northeast Asia and Mideast region. This proves that the U.S. is still seized by arms buildup. 
					
					 This is sparking off a new global arms race. 
					
					 Many countries have opted for bolstering their military capacities for self-defense. 
					
					 The U.S. is the chief culprit disturbing world peace and stability and main architect of arms race. 
					
					 With nothing can the U.S. warlike forces justify their criminal policy for arms buildup nor cover up their true colors.

articles.title: Capitalism Is Bound to Go to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Capitalism Is Bound to Go to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The ever-growing ranks of the working people will provide a powerful force for overthrowing capitalism, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					 Not only workers engaged in physical labor but those in technical and brain work have not become masters of the production means in the capitalist countries, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 White-collar workers have certain differences from blue-collar workers in their technical and cultural levels. But common is that they are all hired by capitalists and live with wages they are paid for their exploitation. So it is natural that in the capitalist countries the working masses of different classes and strata strongly call for independent living and development against exploitation and oppression by capitalists.
					
					 Recent years witnessed big demonstrations in the U.S. and other capitalist countries in which the workers protested against the disparity in wealth and financial monopolistic capitalists. Not only the unemployed but the middle classes took part in the demonstrations unprecedented in scale in the history of capitalism.
					
					 Capitalism is now plunging into the abyss of ruin in the face of the broad working masses' fight against daily-worsening political and economic crisis and exploitation and oppression.
					
					 The capitalist class is trying hard to benumb the independent awareness of the working people and break down their unity in a desperate bid to weather the crisis.
					
					 But capitalism is bound to go to ruin.

articles.title: DPRK-style Retaliatory War Will Be Patriotic, Just War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK-style Retaliatory War Will Be Patriotic, Just War: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The rat-like Lee Myung Bak group of traitors can neither escape severe blows by the nation nor get a chance to regret itself once a merciless retaliatory war is launched by the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The group of traitors on the deathbed is making last-ditch efforts by resorting to more challenging methods for escalating confrontation against reunification, the article says.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The situation has now reached the phase that can no longer be overlooked. To cope with this situation the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK issued a solemn notice that resolute special actions would soon be launched to mercilessly destroy the bases of provocations. The special actions would represent a patriotic and just war for firmly defending the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation and realizing the cherished desire of all the Koreans at home and abroad for the nation's reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The will of the DPRK to launch a resolute retaliatory war is to root out the source of war and confrontation from the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Too clear is that no threatening words can work on such traitors as they are seized by the ambition of escalating confrontation between social systems and kicking up war hysteria to invade the DPRK, clean indifferent to the national reunification and the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The Lee group of conservatives is steeped in sycophantic treachery to the marrow of their bones and born with vicious nature against the nation and the people. As long as it is allowed to stay in power, it would be impossible to realize the desire of the people for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 The just retaliatory war will rid the Korean nation of the military demarcation line and bring reunification to it.
					
					 Those who dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system will never go scot-free, whoever and wherever they are. The enemies of national reunification fated to be wiped out by the army and people of the DPRK are just a handful and no time will be taken in throwing them into the dustbin of history.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Destiny as Politician Nears End: Paper of Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Destiny as Politician Nears End: Paper of Koreans in U.S.
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an Internet paper of the Koreans in the U.S., on April 27 carried an article titled "Lee Myung Bak Called 'Rat'".
					 The compatriots in the north are in high spirits to wipe out the chief executive of south Korea as evidenced by the TV footage of them tearing to pieces Lee's effigy and calling him rat, the article said, adding it is unprecedented in the history of the inter-Korean relations. The article went on:
					
					 The Lee regime got on the nerves of the fellow countrymen in the north when Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il passed away in December last year and did not hesitate to chill the atmosphere for the celebrations of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung in April this year.
					
					 The north has expressed resentment at the Lee regime in the past but never called it "a herd of rats".
					
					 The north seems to have judged it can no longer pardon the Lee regime for slandering even the celebrations for the Day of the Sun, the great auspicious holiday participated in by not only overseas Koreans but a number of foreign guests.
					
					 The Lee regime will soon come to an end. So will his destiny as a politician with no room given for improving the inter-Korean relations. It is in a state in which it can no longer get reconciled and cooperate with the north.
					
					 Primary public attention is being focused on how the Lee regime will be made to leave the arena of history being branded as disgusting human scum.
					
					 Though a small country the north has arms and equipment enough to thwart provocation by any big power. This was fully proved through the military parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of the President and the Exhibition of the Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It was only Lee Myung Bak and his confidants who recklessly hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the north. That is why they are being censured as a "herd of rats".
					
					 The north is getting itself ready to take special actions for the earlier end of the Lee regime.
					
					 The Lee regime will be made to bear full responsibility for all the consequences to be entailed.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Heinous Provocation against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Heinous Provocation against DPRK under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Ho Yong Ho, chairman of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, released a statement on April 28 to denounce the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its heinous provocation against the DPRK.
					 The statement expressed towering resentment at traitor Lee and his group for throwing a wet blanket over the grand festival of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung which all the fellow countrymen celebrated with splendor and seriously slandering and insulting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 It condemned the Lee group's high treason as a mockery and insult to the pure and profound loyalty of all the members of the above-said association to hold in high esteem another great man of Mt. Paektu with the people in the homeland and contribute to its reunification and prosperity.
					
					 It exposed that agents of the Intelligence Service operating at the south Korean consulate in Japan are kicking up unpardonable rackets such as appeasement, deception, threat and contempt against some officials of the association while taking issue with the association and its patriotic activities including the work for supporting national education.
					
					 All the members of the association will turn out in the work to carry out its patriotic cause with the same determination to make a thousand-fold revenge as the people in the homeland who turned out in the sacred and just war of retaliation, the statement concluded.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries in the period between April 5 and 29 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included seminars, Korean book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Russia, Cambodia, Malaysia, India, Indonesia, Mongolia, Belarus, Germany, the Czech Republic, Tunisia, Nigeria, Uganda, Democratic Congo, South Africa, Zimbabwe and Guinea.
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were works of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, photos of their exploits and books and photos introducing the achievements of the Korean people in their building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "In hearts of mankind forever".
					
					 The chairman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia said that all the achievements made in the DPRK were results of great devotion made by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It is a great happiness and honor for us to celebrate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung with the Korean people, the editor-in-chief of the Cambodian Newspaper Pracheachon noted, calling the President the closest friend of the Cambodian people.
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il stated that the founding of the Juche idea was a historical event that opened a new era, independent era when the popular masses have become masters of their destinies for the first time in human history.
					
					 The director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria praised huge exploits Kim Il Sung performed for the era and history under the banner of independence.
					
					 The curator of the Kinshasa City Cultural Center of Democratic Congo stressed that through the celebrations of the 100th Day of the Sun the Korean people demonstrated their firm will to the world once again to glorify the immortal exploits the peerlessly great men performed for all ages and advance along the path of independence chosen by themselves under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Russia, Cambodia, Belarus and Tunisia.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of various countries carried special write-ups on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Vietnamese Paper Quan Doi Nhan Dan on April 14 carried a commemorative article titled "On the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, great person of Korea" illustrated with photos of smiling President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article noted the President was the great leader of the Korean people and a close friend of Vietnamese people.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on the same day carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal sun" with a photo of the President waving back to cheering crowds.
					
					 The article said the President authored lots of works to instill the faith in sure victory and courage into the progressives fighting for independence against imperialism. Voices admiring him are being heard from every part of the world, it added.
					
					 The British paper Proletarian April-May issue dedicated five pages to the article titled "Kim Il Sung 1912-1994" illustrated with photos of the President in the days of Jilin Yuwen High School and receiving internationalist Che Guevara. 
					
					 The paper praised the President as a great leader admired not only by the Korean people but the anti-imperialist fighters across the world.
					
					 It pointed out the President performed undying feats in the global struggle for national liberation against imperialism.
					
					 The April 19th issue of the U.S. paper Worker's World edited an article praising the President's exploits with his portrait.

articles.title: Bulletin in Austria Marks 80th KPA Anniversary
articles.content:
Bulletin in Austria Marks 80th KPA Anniversary
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna brought out a bulletin "On April 25, the Anniversary of the Korean People's Army".
					 The bulletin carried a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung organized the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) on April 25, 1932 and liberated Korea on August 15, 1945 through hard-fought armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean People's Army that originated from the KPRA won a victory under the wise leadership of the President in the three-year war ignited by the U.S. imperialists in the early 1950s.
					
					 The invincible might of the KPA provides a sure guarantee for firmly defending the dignity of the nation and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The KPA carried out its honorable mission as a main force of the socialist construction under the Songun politics of His Excellency Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people and progressives all over the world suffered a great loss at the demise of His Excellency.
					
					 The Korean people, however, could advance along the road of their choice by having Kim Jong Un, identical to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, at the top posts of the party, state and army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea on April 25 issued a statement following the publication of Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche".
					 The Russian Juche idea followers were excited to receive the talk the dear respected Kim Jong Un had with leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on April 6, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The historic work is an important document that would help bring about a new stage for the enrichment of the Juche idea in Kim Jong Un's era and indicates key strategic tasks to be fulfilled by the party, state and army.
					
					 The work offers a glimpse of his shining ideological and theoretical wisdom as a state leader.
					
					 The Juche idea followers in Russia fully support all the ideas, theories and tasks set forth in the work and will actively study and disseminate his work together with works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige el desarrollo del Parque de Diversiones de Rungna
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige el desarrollo del Parque de Diversiones de Rungna
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las labores de desarrollo del Parque de Diversiones del Pueblo de Rungna.
					Le acompano en esta visita de orientacion Jang Song Thaek, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del CDN.
					
					El parque con una dimension de casi 100 hectareas se compone del acuario de delfines, la piscina y la zona de recreo.
					
					Kim Jong Un estuvo primero en el campo de construccion del Acuario de Delfines de Rungna.
					
					El acuario tiene 5 mil 980 metros cuadrados de superficie arquitectonica, 14 mil 940 metros cuadrados de area total y mil 460 asientos de espectador. 
					
					Igualmente, dispone de suficientes facilidades de servicio publico necesarias al disfrute del espectaculo de delfines, tales como una piscina de funcion de casi 3 mil metros cubicos, las otras auxiliares, la sala de divulgacion de datos cientifico -tecnicos, la refresqueria.
					
					Dando vuelta por el interior y exterior del acuario, El Comandante Supremo hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de construccion.
					
					Elogio altamente los orgullos meritos de los constructores militares que terminaron principalmente la obra en menos de un ano.
					
					En su recorrido por la piscina de funcion y las auxiliares, la sala de divulgacion de datos cientifico-tecnicos y otros puntos, se mostro muy satisfecho por la construccion de otro centro moderno y original para el descanso cultural del pueblo.
					
					Indico las tareas que se presentan en la culminacion cualitativa de la obra.
					
					Luego, el se dirigio al lugar de construccion de la Piscina de Rungna.
					
					La piscina consta de un tobogan de 18 m de alto y de 4 carriles de ciento y decenas de metros de largo, la ducha, la refresqueria, el vestuario, etc.
					
					Se puso muy contento imaginando a los jovenes, ninos escolares y trabajadores que descansarian en jolgorio tomando bano en la piscina a inaugurarse  con motivo del Dia de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (27 de Julio).
					
					Subrayo que se debe suplementar diversas instalaciones en el contorno de la piscina como plataforma de salto para que ella no tenga defectos ni en el remoto futuro como sitio de descanso cultural del pueblo.
					
					Ultimamente, recorrio la Zona de Recreo de Rungna.
					
					La zona esta dividida en dos repartos en que estan distribuidos diferentes equipos de diversiones y recreo como carrito de montana rusa, la torre de descenso en picada, el pulpo giratorio y la bicicleta voladora y las instalaciones de servicio publico.
					
					Pasando revista a los repartos 1 y 2 y otros puntos, averiguo en detalles el estado de construccion.
					
					Enseno que se debe construir conducto que una los dos repartos y construir mejor y con mas confort la refresqueria.
					
					Ese dia el primer Presidente investigo los detalles de la obra de malecon del islote Rungna para prevenir los danos de inundaciones.
					
					En la ocasion, el enumero las tareas programaticas surgidas para transformar el islote Rungna como parque de diversiones del pueblo, tales como los remedios para solucionar satisfactoriamente el problema de trafico, las medidas para utilizar generalmente el rio Taedong, la decoracion con lamparillas.
					
					Destacando que el parque de diversiones de Rungna es un regalo preparado por el partido para el pueblo, instruyo terminar la obra hasta el Dia de la Victoria en la Guerra de este ano significativo.
					
					Bajo la diestra direccion del partido, ahora se levantan sucesivamente a lo largo del pais las creaciones monumentales, que sorprenden al mundo, como este parque de diversiones, dijo y agrego que se debe construir mucho mas obras arquitectonicas conforme a la idiosincrasia, el gusto estetico y la demanda del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Corea engalanada de fiesta por el Primero de Mayo
articles.content:
Corea engalanada de fiesta por el Primero de Mayo
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- Los trabajadores de distintas localidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea celebran el Primero de Mayo, Dia Internacional de los Trabajadores.
					Numerosas personas visitan con ramos de flores a las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en la colina Mansu anorando mucho a estos Grandes Hombres sin pares que fundaron y lo glorificaron este pais de masas trabajadoras.
					
					Saltan a la vista en las avenidas de esta capital y otras ciudades del pais las banderas nacionales y las pancartas de fiesta.
					
					El Complejo de Cemento de Sangwon y otras fabricas y empresas, los organos y unidades y las familias a lo largo del pais estan en jolgorio por los actos deportivos y culturales y los juegos de recreo.
					
					Los lugares pintorescos tales como colina Moran, monte Taesong e islote Rungna en esta capital, las zonas de recreo de Waudo de Nampho y Sondowon de Wonsan estan repletos de trabajadores que celebran su dia.
					
					Entrevistado con la ACNC en la zona de recreo Pothonggang, Paek Kwang Ho (36 anos de edad), jefe del equipo de trabajo de la Fabrica de Alambres Electricos 326 de Pyongyang, dijo como lo siguiente:
					
					Vine aqui con mis familiares y amigos y traje muchos platos sabrosos de fiesta.
					
					Despues de almuerzo, queremos organizar un "concierto" familiar.
					
					Esta felicidad se debe al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il que construyeron y desarrollaron este regimen para el pueblo.
					
					Trabajare mucho mas en el futuro para contribuir a la construccion de Estado prospero.

articles.title: EE.UU. es responsable de carrera armamentista, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. es responsable de carrera armamentista, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- Segun el reciente reporte del Instituto Internacional de la Paz en Estocolmo de Suecia sobre los gastos militares del mundo, el ano pasado se desembolsaron por ese concepto en todo el mundo un billon 740 mil millones de US$. EE.UU. ocupo el primer lugar al invertir 711 mil millones de US$ y buena parte de esta suma se asigno a la modernizacion de armas nucleares y establecimiento del sistema antimisiles.
					Por supuesto, ese hecho deparo fuertes criticas de los medios de prensa del mundo que califican a EE.UU. de autor principal de la quiebra de paz y estabilidad del mundo y promotor de la carrera armamentista.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado este martes y prosigue:
					
					Debido al aumento de gastos militares de Estados Unidos, la humanidad corre ahora serio peligro de guerra nuclear.
					
					Si el imperio esta interesado de veras en el aseguramiento de la paz y estabilidad del mundo, debe reducir sus astronomicos gastos militares y dejar de promover la carrera armamentista. Ademas, eso se le presenta ahora como prioridad porque las continuas agresiones y guerras le causaron muchos problemas como crisis economica y financiera cronica.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. cogio la senda opuesta.
					
					Hace unos dias, el asistente del secretario de Defensa de EE.UU. para los asuntos estrategicos mundiales, parloteo que para establecer el sistema regional de defensa antimisiles que abarque al Noreste Asiatico y el Medio Oriente, EE.UU. promueve 2 negociaciones tripartitas apartes, o sea,  EE.UU.-Japon-el Sur de Corea y EE.UU.-Japon-Australia.
					
					Debido a tal intento, se levanta en el escenario internacional la ola de nueva carrera armamentista.
					
					Numerosos paises se dirigen a fortalecer sus fuerzas armadas de autodefensa.
					
					Estados Unidos es el destructor de la paz y estabilidad del mundo y el responsable de carrera armamentista.
					
					Las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas no podran justificar ni encubrir de ninguna manera su criminal politica de aumento de gastos militares.
